name: DemonStar
description:
DemonStar has been heralded as the succesor to Raptor. It is a smooth scrolling shooter made in the tradition of Raiden. Go around collect power-ups and shoot everything.

DemonStar is a shareware video game developed by Mountain King Studios, based on their earlier game Raptor: Call of the Shadows. It is a top-down vertical scrolling shooter game with an outer space theme. The game shares many similarities with the Raiden series. Wikipedia
